# Nordic backgrounds

<center>
![](images/nordic_backgrounds_sticky.png){style="width:200px"}
</center>

D20 investigator backgrounds for the Liminal Horror TTRPG.
These are perfect for new investigators created for [Why does the bell toll?](/the_toll_of_unmeaning/mystery_intro.qmd) mystery.

Designed to represent workers found in the Nordic countries (Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, Sweden, the Faroe Islands, Greenland, and Åland) in the 2020s.

1.  **Aluminium smelter staff:** Heat resistant safety long coat with gloves (1 armor), safety helmet with visor (1 armor), bolt cutters (bulky), aluminium craft wire
2.  **Assistant nurse:** Nurse bag with medical supplies,  scalpel (d6), change of clothing, lanyard with iID
3.  **Construction worker:** Hammer (d6), cordless drill, hardhat (1 armour), steel toe capped boots
4.  **Crime author:** E ink writing tablet, handheld voice recorder, cold case files, snus pouches
5.  **Cyber security intern:** Laptop,travel router, smart watch, forensic disk controller
6.  **Deckhand:** Rigging knife & spike multitool (d6), pen and logbook, life jacket, hard hat with headlamp (1 armor)
7.  **Drone operator:** Drone (bulky), action camera, high vis jacket, anemometer
8.  **Flat pack store employee:** Set of hex keys, DIY toolset, box cutter (d6), 50 small pencils
9.  **Forest worker:** Pottiputki, pole saw, ear and eye protection, DEET spray
10. **Meat processor:** 4 meat grinder blades (d6), box of matches, curing salts, cured meats
11. **Musician:** Acoustic instrument, metronome, tuning fork, beanie
12. **Military reserve:** Shotgun (d6, bulky), flak jacket (1 armor), hand-portable radio, camouflage clothing
13. **Outdoor tourist guide:** Snowmobile, bolt-action rifle (d6, bulky), polarised goggles, turmat
14. **Picture book illustrator:** Paint with brush and palette, pencils and sketchbook, artist apron, kid’s drawings (1 stability)
15. **Plastic brick employee:** Bag of plastic bricks, mini motor set, utility bar (d6), magnifying glasses
16. **Public transport staff**: Minibus, wrench (d6), trolley jack (bulky), cooler bag
17. **Sauna technician:** Bottle of paraffin oil, lineman’s pliers, multimeter, 6 pack of beer
18. **Ski instructor:** Skis with sticks (bulky), ski jacket, folding shovel (d6), thermos with coffee, 
19. **Street artist:** Spray cans, respirator mask, telescopic ladder (bulky), skateboard
20. **Welder:** MIG welder (bulky), welding headshield (1 armor), welding gauntlets, welding clothing
